TitleEnglish: Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club
SummaryEnglish:
Nijigasaki High, a high school located at Odaiba, Tokyo that is popular for its spirit of freedom and its variety of education courses.

Yu Takasaki, a 2nd year in General Education course, is attracted by school idols' appeals. Together with her childhood friend Ayumu Uehara, she decided to visit the School Idol Club.

Occasionally rivals, at times comrades. Holding to their own hopes and wishes, they continue to work hard day by day.

"If only I could support these girls, who are pursuing their dreams......"

This is a school idol project, a story of dreams come true, spun by 9 girls chasing their dreams and 1 ordinary girl.

Reach! This excitement!

Let's chase after our dreams!
Aliases: Love Live! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Dōkōkai
LoveLive! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Dōkōkai
Love Live! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Doukoukai
LoveLive! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Doukoukai
LoveLive! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club

5.TitleEnglish: “Love Live! Nijigasaki Academy School Idol Club” special program just before the second season broadcast “Nijigaku TOKIMEKI Navi♪”
5.SummaryEnglish: "Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club" A special program that looks back on the activities of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club just before the second season of the TV anime airs! Detailed information Performers [Yuu Takasaki] Naki Yano [Ayumu Uehara] Akuri Onishi [Kasumi Nakasu] Mayu Sagara [Setsuna Yuuki] Tomori Kusunoki [Rina Tennoji] Chiemi Tanaka [Mia Taylor] Hide Uchida [Kanoranju] Akina Homoto

7.TitleEnglish: LoveLive! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club Final Chapter Part 1
7.SummaryEnglish: The first in a trilogy of Love Live! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Doukoukai films that continues the story beyond season two and the OVA.

8.SummaryEnglish: The second in a trilogy of Love Live! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Doukoukai films that continues the story beyond season two and the OVA.

9.SummaryEnglish: The last in a trilogy of Love Live! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Doukoukai films that continues the story beyond season two and the OVA.

10.TitleEnglish: 無敵級*ビリーバー / 中須かすみ(CV.相良茉優) アニメーションPV Full
10.SummaryEnglish: 「無敵級*ビリーバー」発売2周年を記念して、アニメーションPV フルVer.を公開！

1.SummaryEnglish: Yu Takasaki and Ayumu Uehara are wandering around DiverCity when they see a school idol named Setsuna Yuki performing and are totally moved. They find out that she actually goes to their school, and they go check out the School Idol Club she belongs to.

2.SummaryEnglish: Kasumi refuses to accept the fact that the School Idol Club has been disbanded and decides to take matters into her own hands. Meanwhile, Karin tries to track down the elusive Setsuna Yuki.

3.SummaryEnglish: The former members of the School Idol Club confront the student council president about her true identity. Meanwhile, Yu gushes about Setsuna Yuki to Nana, and Nana sheds some light on why Setsuna might've quit being a school idol.

4.SummaryEnglish: Ai and Rina join the School Idol Club. The members are impressed with how much Ai seems to be helping them out and then Ai makes some unexpected discoveries on her own.

5.TitleEnglish: Something I Can Only Do Right Now
5.SummaryEnglish: The girls start to make PVs for themselves. Emma wants to be an idol who can make everyone feel all warm and fuzzy inside, and they try to figure out how to visualize that. Emma tries to get Karin to join the club but she seems very opposed to that idea.

6.SummaryEnglish: Rina has always had a hard time communicating with others, but after joining the School Idol Club, she makes the decision to try to change once and for all by putting on a solo performance.

7.SummaryEnglish: Kanata's little sister, Haruka, is a school idol at Shinonome Academy and comes to visit Kanata at her club one day. The sisters are very close, but Haruka is worried that Kanata is pushing herself too hard and makes a drastic decision.

8.SummaryEnglish: Shizuku lands the leading role in an upcoming play for a joint drama festival Nijigasaki and another school are having. However, she loses the role when the Drama Club president tells her that she's unable to truly put herself out there.

9.SummaryEnglish: The Nijigasaki High School Idol Club is invited to perform as school idols at Diver Fest. But there's just one catch... Each school participating will only be able to perform one song.

10.SummaryEnglish: The School Idol Club start their training camp to prepare for their upcoming concert, but something seems to be bugging Ayumu...

11.SummaryEnglish: The girls propose the School Idol Festival to the student council, but the process to get the application approved seems harder than they thought it would be.

12.SummaryEnglish: Things are a little awkward between Yu and Ayumu after their encounter the night before, but everyone continues to prepare for the upcoming School Idol Festival. Yu tries one more time to tell Ayumu something.

13.TitleEnglish: School Idol Festival (The Place Where Everyone's Dreams Come True)
13.SummaryEnglish: The day of the School Idol Festival is finally here. Will everything go according to plan?

8.TitleEnglish: The Place Where the Rainbow Begins

11.TitleEnglish: The Past, the Future, and Now
